summary: A high-school girl acquires the ability to time travel.
cast: Riisa Naka|Akiyoshi Nakao|Munetaka Aoki|Anna Ishibashi|Shôta Chiyo|Tokio Emoto|Mayu Kitaki|Yumika Tajima|Yûya Matsushita|Kôki Katô|Rie Katô|Toshiya Tôyama|Mika Hijii|Kôtarô Shibata|Akiko Takeuchi|Maya Okano|Mao Higuchi|Ayane Mizutani|Hana Yamanashi|Masahiro Hisano|Ryôta Yoshimitsu|Fumio Itô|Kazuhiro Kikuchi|Fumi Higuchi|Megumi Murakami|Ran Tainaka|Masanobu Katsumura|Kanji Ishimaru|Narumi Yasuda
title: Toki o kakeru shôjo
